hibernate-mapping.sql-query: select D.EODP_CODE from EO_DIVIDE_PARAM D where 1 = 1 and D.REC_STATUS = 0 and D.ORG_ID = :orgId <#if eoorCustomerCode??> and nvl(D.EODP_CUSTOMER_CODE, :eoorCustomerCode) = :eoorCustomerCode <#else> and D.EODP_CUSTOMER_CODE is null </#if> <#if eoorOrderTypeCode??> and nvl(D.EODP_ORDER_TYPE_CODE, :eoorOrderTypeCode) = :eoorOrderTypeCode <#else> and D.EODP_ORDER_TYPE_CODE is null </#if> <#if eoorTransTypeCode??> and nvl(D.EODP_TRANSPORT_TYPE_CODE, :eoorTransTypeCode) = :eoorTransTypeCode <#else> and D.EODP_TRANSPORT_TYPE_CODE is null </#if> and OMS_ORDER_DIVIDE_CONDITION(D.EODP_CODE, :eoorOrderNo, :orgId) = 'Y' order by NVL(D.EODP_PRIORITY, 0) desc
